## Testing
- [ ] `pnpm typecheck` passes
- [ ] `pnpm test` passes (all tests)
- [ ] `pnpm lint` passes
- [ ] `pnpm build` succeeds
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] E2E tests pass (`pnpm build && pnpm test`)
